name: Rémoulade Sauce
description: This rémoulade sauce (that goes particularly well with these crab cakes) is not the classic French version, which is made with mayonnaise, cornichons and capers, but rather a French Creole type. This one has paprika, horseradish, garlic and - what could be more all-American? - ketchup.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons grated horseradish, fresh or prepared
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put the egg yolk, mustard, vinegar and paprika in a mixing bowl. Blend with a wire whisk and add the oil gradually. Beat briskly, then add the remaining ingredients and blend well.
